mapper.update:
update online_testpaper
pager_name = #{pagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pager_createTime = #{pagerCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pager_flag = #{pagerFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pager_year = #{pagerYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pager_startTime = #{pagerStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pager_endTime = #{pagerEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pager_score = #{pagerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pager_totalTime = #{pagerTotaltime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pager_results = #{pagerResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paper_difficulty = #{paperDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update online_testpaper set pager_name = #{pagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pager_createTime = #{pagerCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pager_flag = #{pagerFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pager_year = #{pagerYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pager_startTime = #{pagerStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pager_endTime = #{pagerEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pager_score = #{pagerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pager_totalTime = #{pagerTotaltime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pager_results = #{pagerResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paper_difficulty = #{paperDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM online_testpaper ORDER BY `paper_id` limit #{0} , #{1}

SELECT a.paper_id ,a.pager_name , a.pager_startTime , b.`student_totalScope` as 'examinInfor.studentTotalscope' FROM online_testpaper a LEFT JOIN online_examin_infor b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id WHERE b.`student_id`=#{0}
SELECT a.paper_id ,a.pager_name , a.pager_startTime FROM online_testpaper a LEFT JOIN online_examin_infor b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id WHERE b.`student_id`=#{0}
